source.interface:
<implements name="MatrixDecomposition" />
* Hessenberg: [A] = [Q][H][Q]T * A general square matrix [A] can be decomposed by orthogonal * similarity transformations into the form [A]=[Q][H][Q]T * where * *
[H] is upper (or lower) hessenberg matrix *
[Q] is orthogonal/unitary * apete
<method name="getH" type="MatrixStore" startLine="43" endLine="43" /> <method name="getQ" type="MatrixStore" startLine="45" endLine="45" />
